attributes.action: Condemn Saddam Hussains Execution as Deplorable unlike Prescott who just describes the release of the footage as 'Deplorable'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
--------------------------------------

Mr Prescott said: "I think the manner was quite deplorable, really. I don't think one can endorse in any way that, whatever your views about capital punishment.''

He added: "Frankly, to get the kind of recorded messages coming out is totally unacceptable and I think whoever is involved and responsible for it should be ashamed of themselves.''

----------------------------------------

From this it seems as if Prescott condones the death penalty as long as its carried out behind closed doors. We the undersigned believe the Prime-minister should condemn the execution as deplorable -REGARDLESS- of it being carried out in front of, or behind the camera.
